H0.text: Chrometophobia is an irrational fear of what. Money

H1.text: Chrometophobia is an irrational fear of what. Colors

H2.text: Chrometophobia is an irrational fear of what. Metals

H3.text: Chrometophobia is an irrational fear of what. Pelf

A4.text: In that way, money also enables a new type of economic society and the definition of wealth in measurable quantities, such as gold and money.

A5.text: Aristotle describes the basic function of money as a universal instrument of quantitative measurement – 'for it measures all things …' – making things alike and comparable due to a social 'agreement' of acceptance.
